author: luehe
msg: Allow <fmt:formatDate> to have a body. If its 'value' attribute is
missing, and its body content is empty after trimming,
<fmt:formatDate> formats the current time and date.

author: luehe
msg: If the value to be formatted is given as a String, it is now always
If the String is formatted with a different locale than "en", it must
first be parsed to a java.util.Date or java.lang.Number with
<fmt:parseDate> or <fmt:parseNumber>, and the result can then be used
